plot: A young, deaf boy steals an oil canister to support his poor family but when he misplaces the canister a desperate search ensues.
title: War Canister
plot_es: A young, deaf boy steals an oil canister to support his poor family but when he misplaces the canister a desperate search ensues.
plot_en: A young, deaf boy steals an oil canister to support his poor family but when he misplaces the canister a desperate search ensues.
